text:
@PressSec @realDonaldTrump <2% of Americans have been tested. [4 million of 331 million.]

"Anybody that wants a test [for the coronavirus] can get a test.” 

— President Donald Trump, in remarks to reporters on March 6.

#WhereAreTheTests
